trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et panel i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Selv om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> kontroll erstatter og legger til funksjoner til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> kontroll over tidligere versjoner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> er beholdt for bakoverkompatibilitet og fremtidig bruk hvis du velger.

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: En StatusBarPanel representerer en individuelle panelet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: En StatusBarPanel kan inneholde tekst og/eller et ikon som kan brukes til å vise statusen for en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll, hente, legge til eller fjerne en individuelle StatusBarPanel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanel inneholder egenskaper som gjør at du kan endre virkemåten viser til et panel i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>til å vise et ikon i et panel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes til å angi en grafisk fremstilling for statusen i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>egenskapen kan du angi hvordan tekst og/eller et ikon justeres i panelet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: For å sikre at din panelet tilpasses riktig teksten for panelet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>til å endre størrelsen på panelet til tekst for panelet eller til å fylle gjenstående automatisk plass i det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>egenskapen kan du angi en minimumsbredde for panelet for å sikre at den ikke får mindre enn den er ment å vise dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontrollen brukes vanligvis til å vise hjelpeinformasjon eller Tilstandsinformasjon om programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: Det er ofte viktig å vise mer informasjon om dataene som presenteres i en panelet.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>til å vise informasjon når musepekeren holdes på et panel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Selv om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontrollen brukes vanligvis til å vise informasjon, du kan også gi din egen visning-type til en StatusBarPanel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the StatusBarPanel will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>egenskapen kan du angi hvordan StatusBarPanel skal tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>egenskapen brukes til å vise verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>egenskapen (og et ikon, hvis angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, kan du tegne din egen informasjon til panelet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne funksjonen til å tegne et fremdrift for eller et animerte ikon i panelet.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the StatusBarPanel class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en forekomst av klassen StatusBarPanel, settes egenskapene lese-og skrivetilgang til opprinnelige verdier.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste over disse verdiene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, følgende egenskaper for lese-og skrivetilgang er satt til opprinnelige verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|100| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|&10; | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>| En tom streng. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>| En tom streng. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|&100; | Du kan endre verdien for disse egenskapene via en egen kall til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for tekst og ikoner i status for panelet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen skal justeres vannrett teksten og/eller ikonet tildelt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>egenskapen innenfor panelet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Tekst og ikoner kan justeres til venstre, høyre, eller midten av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke mulig å plassere et ikon i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> uavhengig

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel plassere et ikon på venstre side av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>under justering av tekst til høyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: Ikonet er alltid plassert på venstre side av teksten uavhengig av hvordan teksten justeres.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet egenskapen er ikke medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om status for panelet endrer størrelse automatisk.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objekter som er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>har prioritet over disse paneler satt til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>som har egenskapen Autostørrelse satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>forkortet Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>med Autostørrelse-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>krever at plass.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoSize to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke Autostørrelse for å sikre at innholdet i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>vises riktig i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll som inneholder mer enn én panelet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: Du vil for eksempel et panel som inneholder teksten skal justeres automatisk til mengden tekst som vises (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), mens en annen panelet på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>som viser en eier tegnes pågår for må være en fast størrelse (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet egenskapen er ikke medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Starter initialisering av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å starte initialisering av en komponent som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>metoden slutter initialiseringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av BeginInit og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>metoder hindrer at kontrollen brukes før den er fullstendig initialisert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for status for panelet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å skille et panel fra andre paneler i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet egenskapen er ikke medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Slutter initialisering av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å slutte initialisering av en komponent som brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>metoden starter initialiseringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>og EndInit metoder hindrer at kontrollen brukes før den er fullstendig initialisert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ikonet som skal vises i status for panelet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å vise et ikon som representerer statusen for programmet eller en prosess i programmet.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du vise et ikon på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>som viser om en fil lagringen pågår eller er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er ikke mulig å plassere et ikon i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> uavhengig

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du plassere et ikon på venstre side av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>under justering av tekst på høyre side ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: Ikonet er alltid plassert på venstre side av teksten i panelet uavhengig av hvordan teksten justeres.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> som representerer ikonet som skal vises i panelet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minst tillatte bredden på status for panelet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The MinWidth property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MinWidth brukes når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>slik at de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>endrer størrelse automatisk på til en bredde som er for liten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, the MinWidth property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, settes egenskapen MinWidth automatisk til samme verdi som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Minimumsbredde i piksler for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er tilordnet en verdi som er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på for å bruke den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Name samsvarer med nøkkelen for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control that hosts the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> kontrollen som er vert for status for panelet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å bestemme den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontrollere som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>er innenfor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objekter som er lagt til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll ved å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontrollen er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> som inneholder panelet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på status for panelet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å angi om en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>viser tekst eller om panelet er administrert som en eier tegnes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemme når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>må tegnes, oppretter du en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>hendelsen til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>sendes som en parameter til en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>hendelsen gjør mulig å finne ut hvilke panelet skal tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>I tillegg inneholder et <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt som du kan bruke til å utføre tegning oppgaver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet egenskapen er ikke medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som inneholder data om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for status for panelet.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer teksten som vises når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å vise informasjon om programmet i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Text property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke Text-egenskapen til å vise hjelpeinformasjon når brukeren flytter musen over en meny eller vise navnet og plasseringen av en fil som er åpnet i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Juster tekst i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises i panelet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Verktøytipsteksten som er forbundet med status for panelet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å vise mer informasjon i et verktøytips når musepekeren holdes over <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du vise et verktøytips som inneholder dataoverføringshastigheten for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>som viser statusen for en filoverføring.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise verktøytips for andre kontroller i programmet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for verktøytipset for panelet.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som inneholder informasjon om panelet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som inneholder klassenavnet for kontrollen og teksten den inneholder.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på status for panelet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Width property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Width gjenspeiler alltid faktiske bredden på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>og kan ikke være mindre enn den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Skal skaleres automatisk bredden på på nytt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bredden, i piksler, for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: Bredden som er angitt, er mindre enn verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>
